sentences.en: Antarctic air brought biting cold to southern Chile on Thursday.
sentences.cn: 周四，南极气流给智利南部带来了刺骨的严寒。

sentences.en: Factories are grouped in the southern suburb of the city.
sentences.cn: 工厂都集中在城市的南郊.

sentences.en: He had led the conquest of southern Poland in 1939.
sentences.cn: 1939年，他指挥了攻占波兰南部的行动。

sentences.en: He left Britain for the sunnier climes of Southern France.
sentences.cn: 他离开英国，去了阳光更为明媚的法国南部。

sentences.en: He now controls the largest retail development empire in southern California.
sentences.cn: 他现在掌管着加州南部最大的零售发展企业。

sentences.en: Hurricane Andrew has passed over the southern tip of Florida.
sentences.cn: 飓风“安德鲁”已越过佛罗里达州南端。

sentences.en: Leaders of the Southern states are meeting in Louisville.
sentences.cn: 南部一些州的领导正在路易斯维尔开会。

sentences.en: the chalk cliffs of southern England
sentences.cn: 英格兰南部的白垩质峭壁

sentences.en: The islands lie at the southern end of the Kurile chain.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿位于千岛群岛的南端。

sentences.en: The party has attracted a clutch of young southern liberals.
sentences.cn: 聚会吸引了一群南部的年轻开明人士。

sentences.en: the southern slopes of the mountains
The storm cut a swathe through southern England.
sentences.cn: 风暴重创了英格兰南部。

sentences.en: This animal is to be found only in the Southern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这种动物只有在南半球才能找到.

sentences.en: We can go to the arboretum in the southern suburb.
sentences.cn: 我们可以去南郊的植物园.

sentences.en: Yemen commands the strait at the southern end of the Red Sea.
sentences.cn: 也门完全控制着红海南端的海峡。

trans.tran_cn: 南方的，南部的，来自南方的
trans.tran_en: in or from the south of a country or area
